name: Gold Miner (itch)
description:
Deep in the dark mines far far from here. A man is searching for gold, join him on his Quest

This game has been made for the games made quick??? Jam. 

Look for the key and the door to get to the next level. However beware of the dark bats which will hunt you down.  The game is a sort of spelunky mod.  The game has gamepad support. 

Download now for a 100 gold bonus!
